name: DUALITY - WILD WEST KEY PRESS - GAW2
name_original: DUALITY - WILD WEST KEY PRESS - GAW2
description:
1 Week prototype, part of a larger game a week project.

Decided upon a simple western showdown where each player controls half the keyboard, a random key will be displayed which you have to press which in turn shoots the player, the first player to lose all lives loses.
